author: Benjamin Seelbinder
comment: Looks lovely, it watch face unfortunately doesn't appear on way h if downloaded through Google play app store (same with other faces, seems to be a bug). Downloading through the Gears Store (Galaxy Store) probably solves it but finding it is a nightmare. Any suggestions what I can search for to find it (already tried any combo of: black watch face oajoo). Thanks!

author: Alfredo Cruz
comment: I really enjoy the simplicity of this watch face. Some faces have too much visual clutter. This one is right along  I what I look for in a watch face. I just wish that it had an option for 12 hour time as well as it's native 24 hour time. - LG Watch Sport

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello,
Thank you for the feedback and support! The 12 hour time option is not available yet, but we will keep it in mind for future updates.
Oajoo Team

author: jaison thomas
comment: I like the minimalistic approach. A small suggestion,can you fix the image preview on top and make the color editors scrollable? i can't see the preview when editing the last set of colors

author: Jamie Rubbi-Clarke
comment: Nice watch face. Suggest that you put the instructions in the app description though, lots of people giving unfair ratings as it's not clear how to get the watch face onto the watch.

author: Darren Reynolds
comment: I really love the simplicity of this watch face. I would love to one additional option to make it perfect for me and that would be to display a small font showing battery level.

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello Darren,
Thank you for your feedback. We have taken into account your suggestion for future updates.
Oajoo Team

author: Hunter Jorschumb
comment: How to do you change the time from 24 hr to 12 hr instead? Why isn't it available in the first place?

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello,
Thank you again for your comment. The option isn't it available as we wanted to keep the watch face as simple as possible, but your suggestion was taken into account for future updates.
Oajoo Team

author: Steve Watson
comment: Would be nice if it had a 12 hour ,(normal) setting.  Not everyone is in the military.

author: Shriramana Sharma
comment: Very configurable but the font smoothness wasn't reflecting actual DPI of my ASUS ZenWatch 2 so uninstalled.

author: Bruno Julian
comment: App doesn't appear on watch face list. Using Android Wear 2.0 and LG watch Urbane

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello,
Thank you for your feedback. After installing it from your phone Play Store you have to go to the Play Store on the watch, you will see the list with watch faces, then drag from up to down to see the settings, then press the Home icon, then the last option is "Apps on your phone". You will still have to install the watch face.
Oajoo Team

reply.author: OAJOO
reply.content:
Hello,
Thank you for your feedback. Could you send us more details? What do you mean by it doesn't work? What is happening after installation? You couldn't set it as your watch face?
Oajoo Team

author: Daniel Ponte
comment: Awesome! Could you please add a battery % icon?

author: Naeim Momeni
comment: This app is well but it can be better
